reviewText:
Absolutely blissful and I cant believe I waited this long to order the CD's.  I just love reviewing my  poses and
correcting my bad habits and changes.  Thank you

am sure the content for learning is in this series but it's not the main focus. Wanting to exlpore an actual practice to learn from, there was more focus on having an populated event then focusing on the actual moves. It wasn't the experience I was looking for.
